channel.title: toml on Lightning Rod - Tales of Bugs and Errors

item.title: Hugo SSG/CMS and the initial static hussle
item.description: OkayOkay , so bootstrapping this whole thingy was definitely something for the lightning rod , d*mn , i created a hugo page already , but this time the level leveled up somehow. Timeline Theme woes Firstly the timeline theme was really picky, since it needed the respective entries in a folder called timeline , but hokus also wants a subfolder , so all posts are created in content/timeline under a subfolder for each post.
